titleStmt.title: By the Queenes Maiestie Elizabeth by the grace of God, Queene of England, France and Ireland, defendour of the faith &c. : because it hath pleased almighty God by calling to his mercie ... our dearest sister of noble memorie, Mary, late queene ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richarde Iugge, Printer vnto the Queenes Highnesse,

notesStmt.note: STC (2nd ed.) suggests actual imprint is: B. Norton and J. Bill, 1618.
Other title information from first five lines of text.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
